name: BBQ Eater
summary:
【.99 ---> Free】
◆Anniversary ceremony(○^～^○),original price:.99,free for a while!
【No IAP】
◆No IAP(In App Purchase)! If you download the game, you don't need to spend money in the game any more!
◆Are you hungry?Play this game!
◆The most relaxing casual game is now on your iPhone, iPod and iPad!
—————————Features—————————
【Simple Controls】
O(∩_∩)O The game is very simple.Smooth, polished touch interaction.
【Lovely Food】
(^ ▽ ^) Colorful UI.Each food has four kinds of cute expression. For example, smiling, happy and crazy.
【Challenge】
(＝^ω^＝) Game Center support.The top 10 of the player's name will be displayed real time in the game.Who is the most powerful player?
【More】
＼( ^▽^ )／ And..... more to come!
